args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Inoperative Front Turn Signals

Mitsubishi Fuso Truck of America, Inc. (MFTA) is recalling certain 2024 Rizon FEC7K and FEC9K trucks equipped with turn signals integrated into the Koito headlights.  The bulb socket may be defective, causing the front turn signals to burn out.Inoperative turn signals cannot show the driver's intentions to other road users, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 243.0"
